Here's another library that tries to remove all of the navigation, banner a=
ds, etc. from the crawled HMTL content.

  http://code.google.com/p/boilerp=
ipe/

I'm using Heritrix to crawl data that we then analyze using Hadoop an=
d Cascalog. I agree with Noah, extracting the text during the crawl may not=
 be the best strategy. I had success in processing the data after the crawl=
 and extracting the text at that point. This provided us with the flexibili=
ty to try different text extraction methods until we get the best result.

=

Miles
